data.title: Kopecky Family Band News • Red Light Management

data.text:
Hello family!

Well, it seems September just wasn’t enough. The call of the road was too loud for us to only catch part of the country, so we’ve added some more tour dates in October (East Coast be ready)! Tickets are on sale for the first leg now, and be sure to check back this week to grab some for these new dates. You can scroll down to see where we’re headed.

The “Putting the Kids to Bed” tour will be our best yet, and we can’t wait to see you all again!

To say a big thank you for all your support over this past year of touring and recording (and because America of course), all the t-shirts and posters in our online merch store are 50% off! The sale only lasts through July, though, so be sure to head over soon.

Cheers!

Kopecky Family Band

TOUR DATES
